form.label: File Analysis
form.description: Provides insights into the potential Malware downloaded on the Honeypots

search.query: index=honeypot urls=* session_hash=* NOT "*Search\\r\\nConnection*" | stats values(urls) AS urls, values(src_ip) AS src_ip, latest(_time) AS Time, values(host) AS "Sensor" by session_hash | rename urls AS "URL", session_hash AS "Session Hash", src_ip AS "Attacker IP", _time AS "Time" | mvexpand URL | eval Time=strftime(Time,"%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S") | eval urlhash=sha1(URL)| sort - Time | table "URL", urlhash, "Session Hash", "Attacker IP", "Sensor", "Time" | rename urlhash AS "URL Hash"

index=honeypot | transaction endswith=SHA=* maxevents=4 | stats values(malware_url) AS "Malware Downloaded", values(SHA) AS "File Hash (SHA-256)", values(src_ip) AS "Attacker IP", values(_time) AS "Time" by session_hash | table "Malware Downloaded" "File Hash (SHA-256)" session_hash "Attacker IP" "Time" | rename session_hash AS "Session Hash" | eval Time=strftime(Time,"%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S") | sort - Time
index=honeypot urls=* NOT "Search\\r\\nConnection" | rex field=uri_file "(?<uri_file>[^\>\)]*)" | top uri_file
